original_text: When Peter realized what God had done for him, he went to Mary's house. She was the mother of John Mark. Many people were meeting together in her house. They were praying to God.
korean_text: 깨닫고 마가라 하는 요한의 어머니 마리아의 집에 가니 여러 사람이 거기에 모여 기도하고 있더라

sentences.original_text: When Peter realized what God had done for him,
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 하나님이 자신을 위해 하신 일을 깨달았을 때,

sentences.original_text: She was the mother of John Mark.
Many people were meeting together in her house.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그녀의 집에서 함께 모여 있었습니다.
